Bio

I'm an interdisciplinary scholar/blogger with interests in anarchism, cybernetics, horror, psychoanalysis, posthumanism, xenofeminism, and more.

[2] Work

Graduate Research Assistant.

Global Health Discourses Project.

Jan-May 2019.

Employed R and igraph to visualize a social network of global health organizations scraped on organization websites.

Graduate Teaching Assistant.

GSU Dept. of Anthropology.

Aug 17-Dec 2018.

Taught break-out sessions and guest-lectured in several introductory Anthropology courses. I also graded papers, tests, and other assignments.

Growth Marketing Intern.

SimpleShowing, Inc.

July-Nov 2017.

Developed automated leads generation infrastructure in Python, using data from Zillow and other sources with customized text- and email-based outreach and preferential lead selection. I also assisted in updating company websites and customer-facing infrastructure in React, HTML, and CSS.
